casebody.data:
99-0495 (La. 4/1/99)

Robin PALMISANO, et al. v. The STATE of Louisiana Through The DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION. No. 99-CC-0495. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Transportation & Dev. Dept, of; — Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Jefferson 24th Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 491-557; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-CW-1201

Denied.

LEMMON, J. not on panel.
